title: Chicken Omelette ( Leftover Chicken ) Recipes
content:
Healthy chicken omelette which is not only delicious but is very easy to make. You can serve it with rice or enjoy on its own.

 

Chicken Omelette Recipe

Prep time: 10 mins

Cook time: 5 mins

Total time: 15 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 1 serving

 

Ingredients

Eggs - 3

Cooked Chicken - 1 cup shredded

Onion - 1 sliced thinly

Curry leaves a sprig

Salt to taste

Pepper to taste

Coriander leaves - ¼ cup chopped finely

Oil for making an omelette

 

Instructions

Mix all ingredients in a bowl.

Heat oil in a pan. Pour the mix in and cook for 2 mins on low heat. Flip over and cook.

Serve it hot.

recommendations.title: Tasty Baked Chicken Cream Cheese Dip Recipe
recommendations.content:
Delicious chicken cream cheese dip which tastes amazing for parties or get-togethers. This is not only easy to make but taste amazing.
This is a great party recipe. You can make a big batch of it and enjoy it as a dip for parties.
 
Chicken Cream Cheese Dip Recipe

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
